properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CON ,NOTICE_DATE ,NOTICE_COUNT ,NOTICE_WRITER FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(NOTICE_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_COUNT = NOTICE_COUNT + 1 WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CON ,NOTICE_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? )
SELECT NOTICE_NO ,NOTICE_TITLE ,NOTICE_CON ,NOTICE_WRITER FROM TB_NOTICE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(MEM_NO = NOTICE_WRITER) WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_NOTICE_PIC ( NOTICE_PIC_NO ,NOTICE_PIC_NAME_ORIGIN ,NOTICE_PIC_NAME_CHANGE ,NOTICE_PIC_PATH ,NOTICE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_PIC.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? )
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CON = ?, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT NOTICE_PIC_NO ,NOTICE_PIC_NAME_ORIGIN ,NOTICE_PIC_NAME_CHANGE ,NOTICE_PIC_PATH ,NOTICE_NO FROM TB_NOTICE_PIC WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_PIC_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE_PIC SET NOTICE_PIC_NAME_ORIGIN = ? ,NOTICE_PIC_NAME_CHANGE = ? ,NOTICE_PIC_PATH = ? ,NOTICE_PIC_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_PIC_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET NOTICE_STATUS = 'N', UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE_PIC SET NOTICE_PIC_STATUS = 'N', NOTICE_PIC_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_PIC_NO = ? AND NOTICE_PIC_STATUS = 'Y'
